comment: "There was definitely room to negotiate. I probably could have gotten a few hundred more, but the subject matter was ultra-time sensitive and I didn't want to miss the window to sell. I think they're used to people saying yes out of excitement that they're going to get published. If you put in hard work, don't be shy to ask for double what they offer (with good reason, especially if you had expenses) - push back will make them respect you more and help you look more legit - a win-win."
